remarks: Version of ~ ax-bdsep with one DV condition removed, the other DV condition replaced by a non-freeness hypothesis, and without initial universal quantifier.  See also ~ bdsepnfALT .  (Contributed by BJ, 5-Oct-2019.)
statement:
bdsepnf.nf $e |- F/ b ph $.
bdsepnf.1 $e |- Bdd ph $.
bdsepnf $p |- E. b A. x ( x e. b <-> ( x e. a /\ ph ) ) $.
$d a b x $.
